name: Frozen Yogurt - Dessert Cooking
description:
Frozen Yogurt-Dessert Cooking, kitchen game offers you to make your own frozen yogurt as fun kids food with a variety of flavors and toppings. Call your friends and make homemade, fruity, nutty yummy yogurt to give your friends a beautiful looking frozen treat.
Frozen Yogurt-Dessert Cooking game for girls, kid, teen and whole family provides the tips to learn some healthy dessert recipes. Frozen Yogurt-Dessert Cooking is step by step cooking game to learn about how to make frozen yogurt. Little boys and girls get ready for yogurt land and enjoy the process of delicious cooking and become frozen yogurt maker.
Frozen Yogurt-Dessert Cooking in this hot summer season would bring delight and fun cooking for little boys and girls. Choose your favorite color and design of cups and flavors to make a delicious, fresh frozen yogurt ice desert. Fill your cup from frozen yogurt maker and decorate it with various toppings and other food items to look more delicious and enrich in taste. 

Frozen Yogurt-Dessert Cooking is the best cooking game for kids. They are always ready to make and eat frozen yogurt in hot summer days. Little kids start working as a crazy chef frozen food and make some sundae ice cream with a special recipe.

Features:
-Play and become a fro-yo maker
-Easy tap and drag game play
-Real recipe of frozen yogurt
-Color full & attractive food items
-Decorate it with various toppings 
-Easy to play for kids
